channel.title: Random Tech Stuff
channel.description: Recent content on Random Tech Stuff

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, my name is Felix Steffenhagen and I welcome you to my little web space. I’m interested in a lot of things but unfortunately there’s too little time to follow everything. Mostly I’m interested in everything around Linux, Python, Coding, Software Engineering, command-line tools, Data Science, Photography, Reading, Playing Musical Instruments, Watches, Retro Games.

item.title: Tech Stack
item.description: Tech and tools I use mostly OS Ubuntu Linux Programming Languages awk Bash Golang Python Web Firefox: My default Browser Hugo: Static Site Generator Command-line Tools jq mtr tmux mycli Coding tools git PyCharm Misc Tools keepassx: Password Management Websites I browse daily/weekly https://blog.fefe.de https://news.ycombinator.com

item.title: Did Txt
item.description: did.txt: Generate a minimalist micro journal using vim With all the distractions I’m facing in the office I sometimes find it hard to keep track of what I was doing. Some troubleshooting here, a bit of coding there, meetings, etc. Some days are just context switching from one task to the next. At the end of the day it’s still nice to turn back and track your progress and to have a reference point to start off next day.
